attributes.action: Exclude bicycles and their accessories from VAT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cycling is an environmentally friendly way to travel.  Provisions for cyclist cost very little, and help ease the ever increasing strain on Britains infrastructure.  Despite their minimal negative externalities and huge benefit, they aren't afforded the same status as other 'green products'.  Why not?  Incentivise the 'green alternatives'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
